text: Vukov () is a Serbo-Croatian surname, related to the male given name Vuk, meaning wolf. Notable people with this surname include: * Borivoj Vukov (1929–2010), Serbian wrestler * Vice Vukov (1936–2008), Croatian singer and politician ==See also== * Vukov Spomenik, Belgrade, Serbia * Vukov sabor, Serbian cultural event
title: Vukov
